column4: cause this dos game is going like a billion times the speed it should be

confuseduser945: it's not as easy as backing up the files in terms of restoring to the exact same state you were in before, if you want to do that, then you should do a drive image with a tool meant to do that. if you just wanna save your files though, like your images and movies and work files, just back those up and when you reinstall windows you can just drop them in place
